languages.text: "Раз вы закончили..." {n}Соломон вскидывает оружие.{/n} "Руолдо, ты творил немыслимую ересь, и я отказываюсь признавать тебя человеком и зачитывать приговор, как того заслуживают преступники. Ты — пятно на истории Тассеры, и тебя пора стереть". {n}Он казнит губернатора быстро, но на миг на лице проктора проскальзывает не то крайнее отвращение, не то ненависть.{/n}
languages.translation_comment:
В начале достает оружие, если еще не достал
Соломон убивает скомороха

traits.locale_text: {n}Четким движением проктор всаживает пулю в лоб губернатора. Дернувшись, Руолдо Дрейк безвольно оседает на пол.{/n} "Я все сказал".
traits.speaker: SolomorneCompanion

languages.translation_comment:
В начале достает оружие, если еще не достал
Соломон убивает скомороха

languages.text: "Since you're done..." {n}Solomorne points his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Раз вы закончили..." {n}Соломон вскидывает оружие.{/n} "Руолдо, ты творил немыслимую ересь, и я отказываюсь признавать тебя человеком и зачитывать приговор, как того заслуживают преступники. Ты — пятно на истории Тассеры, и тебя пора стереть". {n}Он казнит губернатора быстро, но на миг на лице проктора проскальзывает не то крайнее отвращение, не то ненависть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Since you are done..." {n}Solomorne throws up his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human or read your verdict as a criminal would be entitled to. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you." {n}Though he executes the governer quickly, a fleeting expression of extreme disgust, or else hatred, passes over the Proctor's face.{/n}

"Since you are done..." {n}Solomorne throws up his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human or read your verdict as a criminal would be entitled to. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you." {n}Though he executes the governer quickly, a fleeting expression of extreme disgust, or else hatred, passes over the Proctor's face.{/n}

You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governer quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governer quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

"Since you're done..." {n}Solomorne points his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

languages.text: “既然你已经问完了……”{n}索罗蒙指着自己的武器。{/n}“罗尔多，你犯下了不可饶恕的异端恶行。我拒绝承认你是人类成员，也拒绝以‘罪犯’这个词来称呼你。你是塔瑟拉历史上的污点，是时候将你这个污点彻底抹除了。{n}尽管索罗蒙干净利落地处决了总督，但你看到他脸上掠过了一丝难以言喻的厌恶，甚至称得上是仇恨。”{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you're done..." {n}Solomorne points his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然你已经问完了……”{n}索罗蒙指着自己的武器。{/n}“罗尔多，你犯下了不可饶恕的异端恶行。我拒绝承认你是人类成员，也拒绝以‘罪犯’这个词来称呼你。你是塔瑟拉历史上的污点，是时候将你这个污点彻底抹除了。{n}尽管索罗蒙干净利落地处决了总督，但你看到他脸上掠过了一丝难以言喻的厌恶，甚至称得上是仇恨。”{/n}

languages.text: 「もう終わったというなら…」{n}ソロモーンは、武器を向ける。{/n}「ルオルド、お前は考えがたい異端行為に従事した。お前を人間とは認めたくないし、罪に見合う判決を読み上げる気も起きない。お前はタッセーラの歴史の汚点であり、今がそれを掃除するときだ」{n}代理人は、総督を迅速に処刑するが、彼の顔に不愉快極まりない、憎しみにも似たつかの間の表情を見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you're done..." {n}Solomorne points his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「もう終わったというなら…」{n}ソロモーンは、武器を向ける。{/n}「ルオルド、お前は考えがたい異端行為に従事した。お前を人間とは認めたくないし、罪に見合う判決を読み上げる気も起きない。お前はタッセーラの歴史の汚点であり、今がそれを掃除するときだ」{n}代理人は、総督を迅速に処刑するが、彼の顔に不愉快極まりない、憎しみにも似たつかの間の表情を見る。{/n}

languages.text: «Ya que ha terminado...», {n}dice Solomorne empuñando su arma.{/n} «Ruoldo, ha perpetrado una herejía impensable, y me niego a reconocerlo como un ser humano o dictar sentencia como correspondería a un criminal. Es usted una mancha en la historia de Thassera, y ha llegado el momento de limpiarla». {n}Aunque ejecuta sumariamente al gobernador, vislumbras una expresión de repugnancia absoluta, tal vez incluso odio, que asoma fugazmente al rostro del Procurador.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you're done..." {n}Solomorne points his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ya que ha terminado...», {n}dice Solomorne empuñando su arma.{/n} «Ruoldo, ha perpetrado una herejía impensable, y me niego a reconocerlo como un ser humano o dictar sentencia como correspondería a un criminal. Es usted una mancha en la historia de Thassera, y ha llegado el momento de limpiarla». {n}Aunque ejecuta sumariamente al gobernador, vislumbras una expresión de repugnancia absoluta, tal vez incluso odio, que asoma fugazmente al rostro del Procurador.{/n}

languages.text: "İşiniz bittiyse..." {n}Solomorne silahını doğrultuyor.{/n} "Ruoldo, akıl almaz bir kâfirliğe bulaştın. Seni insan olarak tanımayı ya da hükmünü bir suçluya yakışır şekilde okumayı reddediyorum. Thassera tarihine bir leke olarak geçtin, o lekeyi temizleme vakti geldi." {n}Valiyi çabucak infaz etse de Üsteğmen'in yüzünde mutlak bir tiksinti, belki de nefret ifadesi belirdiğini görüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you're done..." {n}Solomorne points his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İşiniz bittiyse..." {n}Solomorne silahını doğrultuyor.{/n} "Ruoldo, akıl almaz bir kâfirliğe bulaştın. Seni insan olarak tanımayı ya da hükmünü bir suçluya yakışır şekilde okumayı reddediyorum. Thassera tarihine bir leke olarak geçtin, o lekeyi temizleme vakti geldi." {n}Valiyi çabucak infaz etse de Üsteğmen'in yüzünde mutlak bir tiksinti, belki de nefret ifadesi belirdiğini görüyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: « Puisque vous en avez fini... {n}Solomorne met le gouverneur en joue.{/n} Ruoldo, vous vous êtes livré à une hérésie dépassant l'entendement. Je refuse de vous reconnaître en tant qu'être humain ou de vous lire votre verdict comme à tout criminel. Vous souillez l'histoire de Thassera et il est plus que temps de vous effacer de ses annales. » {n}Malgré l'exécution rapide du gouverneur, vous remarquez une expression fugace de dégoût absolu, voire de haine, sur le visage du proctor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you're done..." {n}Solomorne points his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Puisque vous en avez fini... {n}Solomorne met le gouverneur en joue.{/n} Ruoldo, vous vous êtes livré à une hérésie dépassant l'entendement. Je refuse de vous reconnaître en tant qu'être humain ou de vous lire votre verdict comme à tout criminel. Vous souillez l'histoire de Thassera et il est plus que temps de vous effacer de ses annales. » {n}Malgré l'exécution rapide du gouverneur, vous remarquez une expression fugace de dégoût absolu, voire de haine, sur le visage du proctor.{/n}

languages.text: "Nachdem Ihr fertig sein ..." {n}Solomorne erhebt seine Waffe.{/n} "Ruoldo, ihr habt unvorstellbare Ketzerei betrieben, und ich verweigere Euch die Anerkennung als menschliches Wesen sowie ein Urteil, wie es einem Verbrecher zustünde. Ihr seid ein Schandfleck in der Geschichte von Thassera, und es ist Zeit, Euch daraus zu tilgen." {n}Obwohl er den Gouverneur schnell hinrichtet, siehst du, wie kurz ein Ausdruck absoluter Abscheu, ja sogar Hass über das Gesicht des Proktors huscht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Since you're done..." {n}Solomorne points his weapon.{/n} "Ruoldo, you have committed unthinkable heresy, and I refuse to acknowledge you as a human being or read your verdict as befitting a criminal. You are a stain on Thassera's history, and it is time to wipe you from it." {n}Although he executes the governor quickly, you see a fleeting expression of absolute disgust, perhaps even hatred, pass over the Proctor's face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Nachdem Ihr fertig sein ..." {n}Solomorne erhebt seine Waffe.{/n} "Ruoldo, ihr habt unvorstellbare Ketzerei betrieben, und ich verweigere Euch die Anerkennung als menschliches Wesen sowie ein Urteil, wie es einem Verbrecher zustünde. Ihr seid ein Schandfleck in der Geschichte von Thassera, und es ist Zeit, Euch daraus zu tilgen." {n}Obwohl er den Gouverneur schnell hinrichtet, siehst du, wie kurz ein Ausdruck absoluter Abscheu, ja sogar Hass über das Gesicht des Proktors huscht.{/n}
